ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(BillingStreet), RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Residential_Account", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Building_Owner", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Contractor", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Designer", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Distributor", RecordType.DeveloperName = "IKOPRO_Contractor", RecordType.DeveloperName = "IKOPRO_Contractor_HA_OK", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Other", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Residential_Account", RecordType.DeveloperName = "School_Board", RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Architect", RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Contractor", RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Distributor", RecordType.DeveloperName = "EU_Prospect" ) )
